page.title: 16SHOTESHAM/HOWE RECREATION
page.content: {CLUBS}Bowls, 50 members compete in 3 leagues and for 10 local cups. Wives' Group, 18 members meet monthly. Shotesham W.I., 19 members, monthly. Scouts, 80 boys from the surrounding area meet 4 nights a week, at their Scout Hut. Age ranges from 8 to 21yrs. Over 60s or Maiden Heart club, 40 members meet fortnightly, play darts, whist, bowls and compete at dominoes with other clubs in South Norfolk. Home{ENTERTAINMENT}forms a vital part of socialising due to the lack of formal facilities. A farmer allows the use of an area of grass called "The Hockey Field" for a peppercorn rent. Fund_raising by villagers helps supplement the grass cutting costs paid by the Parish Council. Shooting, fishing, walking, DIY, horse riding, painting, knitting etc., sculpture, collage are local{HOBBIES}
